speaker.name: Andrii Soldatenko
speaker.biography: Hi there! I’m Pythonista from Ukraine, I'm working remotely as a Senior Software Engineer at Astronomer. Also I'm a speaker at many PyCons and meetups around the globe. In my free time I’m crossFit and gymnastic amateur.
